meanings.definition: A person who asks questions or seeks information.
meanings.sent1: The young inquirers raised their hands eagerly in class.
meanings.sent2: The inquirers at the library were looking for books on dinosaurs.
meanings.sent3: The inquirers at the museum were puzzled by the ancient artifact.
meanings.sent4: The inquirers in the group were like detectives on a case.
meanings.sent5: The inquirers in the crowd were like curious cats exploring a new room.

meanings.definition: Those who investigate or search for knowledge.
meanings.sent1: The team of inquirers examined the crime scene for clues.
meanings.sent2: The inquirers in the lab were conducting experiments to find a cure.
meanings.sent3: The inquirers on the expedition were excited to uncover hidden treasures.
meanings.sent4: The inquirers in the research team were like explorers charting new territories.
meanings.sent5: The inquirers in the group were like seekers on a quest for wisdom.
